item.title: D2L-64-Kernel Regression
item.description: Nadaraya-Watson Kernel Regression 2022-04-20 Tags: #KernelRegression #Nonparametric #Attention #MachineLearning Intuition Definition $$f(x) = \sum_{i=1}^n \frac{K(x - x_i)}{\sum_{j=1}^n K(x - x_j)} y_i$$

item.title: D2L-66-Kernel Regression and Attention
item.description: Kernel Regression And Attention 2022-04-20 Tags: #KernelRegression #Attention #DeepLearning Nadaraya-Watson kernel regression is an example of machine learning with attention mechanisms.
